videos.title: Stop Doing Head Math in Blender: Turn Any Input Field Into a Calculator (+ Auto Unit Conversion)
videos.creator: CG Cookie
videos.description:
Blender tip: any numeric field can do math for you. Type 5+2, press Enter, get 7. It also handles -, *, /.
Example: camera at 5 m, move object +2 m? Type 5+2 and confirm.

It converts units too: enter...
